select b.id, b.title, b.description, b.cover, b.content, b.up, b.down, b.star, b.views, b.status, b.create_time, u.id as u_id, u.nickname as u_nickname, u.avatar as u_avatar, u.is_admin as u_is_admin, u.is_disable as u_is_disable, u.create_time as u_create_time, count(up.id) as up_count, count(down.id) as down_count, (select count(*) from blog where blog.author_id = u.id and blog.status = 1) as pass_count,
, if((select count(up.id) from up where up.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_up, if((select count(down.id) from down where down.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_down, if((select count(star.id) from star where star.user_id = #{userId}) > 0, 1, 0) as is_star
from blog b left join user u on b.author_id = u.id left join up on b.author_id = up.user_id and b.id = up.blog_id left join down on b.author_id = down.user_id and b.id = down.blog_id
